attributes.action: Investigate all sale & resale sites for PS5 and include Concert Tickets
attributes.additional_details: Its clearly an extortion racket that goes beyond individuals and its gone on for years PS5 is an example today; concert tickets has been an issue for years. The Government does little to protect the public with this issue
attributes.background: I would like the instant resale of new items banned. As an example Sony PS5 sales and Concert Tickets. Extortion comes to mind, how does an individual on Ebay have 10 PS5 for sale at £1500 each ?
